column5: Hey Folks, I finally finished editing day 2 of 3 of my Carp adventure with my pals on Rice Lake.  I hope you enjoy it!
Thanks for sharing. I miss carp fishing and hearing the screaming alarms.
No problem. Yeah I only get to go carp fishing once a year. I love how it always goes from 0 to 60 when using a bolt rig.
Thanks looks like a great place chill and catch carp.  Perfect even!  Almost lost the rod on that one take, eh?  lol Thanks the video, Guys!
Thanks for the good words Mike!  It keeps things pretty exiting when you almost lose your gear on a take. We all had our drags set to zero but they were still almost taking our rods into the lake.
You and me too Victor...last time was three years ago when my son caught one below the pump house over twenty pounds... Nobody fishing there now or chumming... I guess the carp moved on...
The pictures make it look pretty tastey. I've brined and smoked a few other kinds of fish so I. Imagine it would be quite tastey.
